Room.Name: Hofton Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Hofton Avenue, walking past the Red-Eye Pub and Grill.
Room.LongDescription: A silvery metal gate separates you from the patio of the Pub and Grill, and the road. Looking to the south, you can see various people sitting around talking about their adventures and life in general. There is a stage a little further to the west.
